sub_title: Product Launch Specialist Team Lead at Omron Healthcare Europe
summary:
In the last 9 years I’ve developed my career working in the medical device manufacturing industry. Throughout this time I have worked in various functions, departments and on over 100 new product introductions.

I’m specialized in coordinating new product launch preparation and product lifecycle magement projects for the EMEA region. By combining my thoroughness with the ability to manage multiple projects of shifting priorities and strong communication skills, I have had a significant contribution to bringing healthcare products from manufacturer to the consumer. 

I’m most proud of the projects that resulted in launching new, innovative products that can truly change people’s lives by bringing healthcare in their focus. I gain my energy from these projects and do not shy away from complex problems and challenges.

In my non-professional side I love spending time with my daughters, reading, exploring gastronomy and bing-watching Netflix shows.

profile_positions.description:
SPARK is an international NGO (with 9 regional offices) that manages projects and programmes for developing entrepreneurship and higher education in Western Africa, Southeast Europe and in the Near East.
 
In this position as an office manager intern I was responsible for providing overall assistance in various fields of administration, office management, recruitment and quality assurance.
profile_positions.title: Office Intern

profile_positions.description: Overseeing various project and administration related tasks, communicating with authorities and contractors, organizing conferences, book reviews and internal events.
